books.author: by E. L. James
books.description: A sequel told from Christian's point of view.
books.name: GREY

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Two friends on Nantucket must deal with damaging gossip about themselves and their husbands.
books.name: THE RUMOR

books.author: by Grant Blackwood
books.description: A former collaborator continues Clancy’s series about the covert intelligent expert Jack Ryan Jr. (Clancy died in 2013.)
books.name: TOM CLANCY UNDER FIRE

books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: After her husband’s sudden death, a woman falls in love with a country music superstar.
books.name: COUNTRY

books.author: by Brad Meltzer
books.description: In the third Culper Ring novel, a member of a secret society charged with protecting the presidency becomes involved when a severed arm is found in the White House Rose Garden.
books.name: THE PRESIDENT'S SHADOW

books.author: by Andy Weir
books.description: Abandoned by his crew, an astronaut embarks on a dogged quest to stay alive.
books.name: THE MARTIAN

books.author: by Anthony Doerr
books.description: The lives of a blind French girl and a gadget-obsessed German boy before and during World War II; the winner of the 2015 Pulitzer Prize.
books.name: ALL THE LIGHT WE CANNOT SEE

books.author: by Stephen King
books.description: A deranged reader’s infatuation with a Salingeresque novelist has dangerous and long-lasting consequences.
books.name: FINDERS KEEPERS

books.author: by Judy Blume
books.description: Secrets are revealed and love stories play out against the backdrop of a series of plane crashes in 1950s New Jersey.
books.name: IN THE UNLIKELY EVENT

books.author: by Nelson DeMille
books.description: A surveillance expert monitors the activities of a newly resurgent Russia.
books.name: RADIANT ANGEL

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: Two sisters are separated in World War II France: one in the countryside, the other in Paris.
books.name: THE NIGHTINGALE

books.author: by Jessica Knoll
books.description: The life of a successful New York magazine writer is shaken when secrets from her past are revealed in a documentary.
books.name: LUCKIEST GIRL ALIVE

books.author: by George R.R. Martin
books.description: In the frozen wastes to the north of Winterfell, sinister and supernatural forces are mustering.
books.name: A GAME OF THRONES

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: A police detective who left the force when his family was murdered teams up with his former partner to solve the case.
books.name: MEMORY MAN
